Pernyataan Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup Soal Tewasnya Afridza Munandar di Sepang
02 Nov 2019, 18:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) merilis pernyataan resmi terkait tewasnya pebalap Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, usai mengalami kecelakaan hebat dalam balapan pertama (Race 1) di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, pada Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pebalap asal Tasikmalaya ini terjatuh di Tikungan 10 pada lap pertama. Usai mendapat perawatan medis dari petugas trek, ia ditransfer ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur dengan helikopter. Sayangnya, nyawa Afridza tak tertolong.
Musim ini, Afridza terhitung telah mengoleksi tujuh podium, yang tiga di antaranya merupakan kemenangan, sementara sisanya adalah dua kali finis kedua dan dua kali finis ketiga.
Menjelang pekan balap di Sepang, ia duduk di peringkat ketiga pada klasemen pebalap dengan 142 poin, tertinggal 27 poin saja dari rider asal Jepang, Takuma Matsuyama yang ada di puncak.
Berikut pernyataan resmi IATC.

Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup Statement Regarding the Death of Afridza Munandar in Sepang
02 Nov 2019, 18:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) released an official statement related to the death of Indonesian rider, Afridza Munandar, after experiencing a severe accident in the first race (Race 1) at the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, on Saturday (11/02/2019).
This racer from Tasikmalaya fell in Bend 10 on the first lap. After receiving medical treatment from the track officer, he was transferred to the Kuala Lumpur Hospital by helicopter. Unfortunately, Afridza's life was beyond help.
This season, Afridza has collected seven podium finishes, three of which are victories, while the rest are twice the second finish and twice the third finish.
Ahead of the racing week at Sepang, he sits third in the drivers standings with 142 points, 27 points behind Japanese rider Takuma Matsuyama at the top.
Following is the official statement of the IATC.
